means: 过分屈从的行为或态度

sentence.Network_en: She's a curious mixture of stubbornness and servility.
sentence.Network_cn: 她既固执又恭顺，令人捉摸不透。

sentence.Network_en: Then , what submission , what cringing and fawning , what servility, what abject humiliation!
sentence.Network_cn: 好一个低眉垂首、阿谀逢迎、胁肩谄笑 、 卑躬屈膝的场面!

sentence.Network_en: When he saw me, he took off his hat with an air of gorgeous servility.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到我, 脱掉帽子,满脸都是阿谀的神色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... ) servile a 奴隶的 servility n " 奴性；屈从 （observe 观察+.
feasibility 可行的servility 奴性，卑屈mobility 易动的

list.abs: Brown ' s attempt at servile insurrection ., 布朗在奴隶起义上做的努力.
Adfinitas 姻亲关系Adfinitates serviles 奴隶姻亲关系Adgnatio 宗亲
Cognatio naturalis 自然血亲Cognationes serviles 奴隶亲属关系Cognatus 血亲
Brown ' s attempt at servile insurrection ., 布朗在奴隶起义上做的努力.

entry.def: If you say that someone is servile, you disapprove of them because they are too eager to obey someone or do things for them.

example.ex: They said she had a servile attitude to her employer.
example.tran: 他们说她对她的老板阿谀逢迎。

auth_sentence.content: Popular fury finds its counterpart in courtly servility.
auth_sentence.res_content: Popular fury finds its counterpart in courtly servility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Popular fury finds its counterpart in courtly servility.

auth_sentence.content: In many ways it was their servility that allowed these men to become so close to the emperor.
auth_sentence.res_content: In many ways it was their servility that allowed these men to become so close to the emperor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In many ways it was their servility that allowed these men to become so close to the emperor.

stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve[n.储备[物],储备金;缄默 v.保留,储备;预定]+ed……的→保留的,不多说的
service[n.服务;公共设施;维修保养;行政部门 v.维修]+able能……的→可服务的→有用的
serv服务+ile……的→为[主人]服务的
deserve[v.应受,值得]+dly→adv.应得报酬地,当然地
con全部+serv保持+e→全部保持下来→保存

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
stems_affixes.word_buile: conserve保存,保藏+ation表名词→n.保存,保护,保守;守恒,不灭
conserve保存,保藏+ative物→n.保守主义者
servile[adj.奴性的,百依百顺的]+ity表名词→n.奴态,卑屈
de去掉+sert=serv服务,上菜→把正餐撤走,上餐后甜点
ob加强+serve=serv保持+ance表名词→一直在保持→遵守,奉行
observe观察,观测,注意到+ation表名词→n.观察,观测,监视;[n.]观察资料;观察力
observe观察+atory场所→用来观察的场所
re再+serv保留+e→再保留
reserve保留,储备+oir→保留水的地方
serv服务+ant人→服务[主人]的人→仆人

dis不,坏+serv服务+e→坏的服务→危害
